verses.verse: Then went<WH5927> Boaz<WH1162> up to the gate,<WH8179> and sat<WH3427> him down there:<WH8033> and, behold,<WH2009> the kinsman<WH1350> of whom<WH834> Boaz<WH1162> spoke<WH1696> came<WH5674> by; to whom he said,<WH559> Ho, such<WH6423> a one!<WH492> turn<WH5493> aside, sit<WH3427> down here.<WH6311> And he turned<WH5493> aside, and sat<WH3427> down.
And he took<WH3947> ten<WH6235> men<WH582> of the elders<WH2205> of the city,<WH5892> and said,<WH559> Sit<WH3427> you down here.<WH6311> And they sat<WH3427> down.

And he said<WH559> to the kinsman,<WH1350> Naomi,<WH5281> that is come<WH7725> again<WH7725> out of the country<WH7704> of Moab,<WH4124> sells<WH4376> a parcel<WH2513> of land,<WH7704> which<WH834> was our brother<WH251> Elimelech's:<WH458>

And I thought<WH559> to advertise<WH1540> <WH241> you, saying,<WH559> Buy<WH7069> it before<WH5048> the inhabitants,<WH3427> and before<WH5048> the elders<WH2205> of my people.<WH5971> If<WH518> you will redeem<WH1350> it, redeem<WH1350> it: but if<WH518> you will not redeem<WH1350> it, then tell<WH5046> me, that I may know:<WH3045> for there is none<WH369> to redeem<WH1350> it beside<WH2108> you; and I am after<WH310> you. And he said,<WH559> I will redeem<WH1350> it.

Then said<WH559> Boaz,<WH1162> What day<WH3117> you buy<WH7069> the field<WH7704> of the hand<WH3027> of Naomi,<WH5281> you must buy<WH7069> it also of Ruth<WH7327> the Moabitess,<WH4125> the wife<WH802> of the dead,<WH4191> to raise<WH6965> up the name<WH8034> of the dead<WH4191> on his inheritance.<WH5159>

And the kinsman<WH1350> said,<WH559> I cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> redeem<WH1350> it for myself, lest<WH6435> I mar<WH7843> my own inheritance:<WH5159> redeem<WH1350> you my right<WH1353> to yourself; for I cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> redeem<WH1350> it.

Now this<WH2063> was the manner in former<WH6440> time<WH6440> in Israel<WH3478> concerning<WH5921> redeeming<WH1353> and concerning<WH5921> changing,<WH8545> for to confirm<WH6965> all<WH3605> things;<WH1697> a man<WH376> plucked<WH8025> off his shoe,<WH5275> and gave<WH5414> it to his neighbor:<WH7453> and this<WH2063> was a testimony<WH8584> in Israel.<WH3478>
Therefore the kinsman<WH1350> said<WH559> to Boaz,<WH1162> Buy<WH7069> it for you. So he drew<WH8025> off his shoe.<WH5275>

And Boaz<WH1162> said<WH559> to the elders,<WH2205> and to all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> You are witnesses<WH5707> this day,<WH3117> that I have bought<WH7069> all<WH3605> that was Elimelech's,<WH458> and all<WH3605> that was Chilion's<WH3630> and Mahlon's,<WH4248> of the hand<WH3027> of Naomi.<WH5281>

Moreover<WH1571> Ruth<WH7327> the Moabitess,<WH4125> the wife<WH802> of Mahlon,<WH4248> have I purchased<WH7069> to be my wife,<WH802> to raise<WH6965> up the name<WH8034> of the dead<WH4191> on his inheritance,<WH5159> that the name<WH8034> of the dead<WH4191> be not cut<WH3772> off from among<WH5973> his brothers,<WH251> and from the gate<WH8179> of his place:<WH4725> you are witnesses<WH5707> this day.<WH3117>

And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that were in the gate,<WH8179> and the elders,<WH2205> said,<WH559> We are witnesses.<WH5707> The LORD<WH3068> make<WH5414> the woman<WH802> that is come<WH935> into<WH413> your house<WH1004> like Rachel<WH7354> and like Leah,<WH3812> which<WH834> two<WH8147> did build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of Israel:<WH3478> and do<WH6213> you worthily<WH2428> in Ephratah,<WH672> and be famous<WH7121> <WH8034> in Bethlehem:<WH1035>

And let your house<WH1004> be like the house<WH1004> of Pharez,<WH6557> whom<WH834> Tamar<WH8559> bore<WH3205> to Judah,<WH3063> of the seed<WH2233> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall give<WH5414> you of this<WH2063> young<WH5291> woman.<WH5291>
So Boaz<WH1162> took<WH3947> Ruth,<WH7327> and she was his wife:<WH802> and when he went<WH935> in to her, the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> her conception,<WH2032> and she bore<WH3205> a son.<WH1121>

And the women<WH802> said<WH559> to Naomi,<WH5281> Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> has not left<WH7673> you this day<WH3117> without a kinsman, that his name<WH8034> may be famous<WH7121> in Israel.<WH3478>

And he shall be to you a restorer<WH7725> of your life,<WH5315> and a nourisher<WH3557> of your old<WH7872> age:<WH7872> for your daughter<WH3618> in law,<WH3618> which<WH834> loves<WH157> you, which<WH834> <WH1931> is better<WH2896> to you than seven<WH7651> sons,<WH1121> has born<WH3205> him.
And Naomi<WH5281> took<WH3947> the child,<WH3206> and laid<WH7896> it in her bosom,<WH2436> and became<WH1961> nurse<WH539> to it.

And the women her neighbors<WH7934> gave<WH7121> it a name,<WH8034> saying,<WH559> There is a son<WH1121> born<WH3205> to Naomi;<WH5281> and they called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Obed:<WH5744> he is the father<WH1> of Jesse,<WH3448> the father<WH1> of David.<WH1732>
Now these<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Pharez:<WH6557> Pharez<WH6557> begat<WH3205> Hezron,<WH2696>
And Hezron<WH2696> begat<WH3205> Ram,<WH7410> and Ram<WH7410> begat<WH3205> Amminadab,<WH5992>
And Amminadab<WH5992> begat<WH3205> Nahshon,<WH5177> and Nahshon<WH5177> begat<WH3205> Salmon,<WH8009>
And Salmon<WH8012> begat<WH3205> Boaz,<WH1162> and Boaz<WH1162> begat<WH3205> Obed,<WH5744>
And Obed<WH5744> begat<WH3205> Jesse,<WH3448> and Jesse<WH3448> begat<WH3205> David.<WH1732>
